Articles.Content: <figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"><img src="http://40.media.tumblr.com/ab8ca95fa6c767a94ca66db2600759c6/tumblr_inline_ny4z1pOdk41rr2wit_540.jpg" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"/></figure><figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="768" data-orig-width="1024"><img src="http://40.media.tumblr.com/a5e0ba2185c72f2e78becacdcaba420d/tumblr_inline_ny4z4tZAPC1rr2wit_540.png" data-orig-height="768" data-orig-width="1024"/></figure><p>If you want your <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/140034">Kerbals to look as humans</a> you can use this modd, includes a texture re placer and soon a wide variety of skin tones by CliftonM. #KSP <br/></p>

Looks cool and all, but Squad... You think one day you can give modders access to the Kerbals models and animations? RSS could really benefit from human scaled kerbals.

The heads already 1:1. Just need the body.

That is only two skin tones. Not a "wide variety." You might be thinking of another human skin texture pack if you're thinking of one that includes a wider variety of skins tones.

[spoiler=Like this one][img]http://i.imgur.com/FMe09Bk.png[/img][/spoiler] Edited November 23, 2015 by GregroxMun

[quote name='GregroxMun']That is only two skin tones. Not a "wide variety."[/QUOTE]

The word "soon" was attached to the bit about "a wide variety". In other words, it's being worked upon.
to be honest as I've read the topic title I was expecting real human models :(

[quote name='SQUAD']<figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480">[IMG]http://40.media.tumblr.com/ab8ca95fa6c767a94ca66db2600759c6/tumblr_inline_ny4z1pOdk41rr2wit_540.jpg[/IMG]</figure><figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="768" data-orig-width="1024">[IMG]http://40.media.tumblr.com/a5e0ba2185c72f2e78becacdcaba420d/tumblr_inline_ny4z4tZAPC1rr2wit_540.png[/IMG]</figure>If you want your [URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/140034"]Kerbals to look as humans[/URL] you can use this modd, includes a texture re placer and soon a wide variety of skin tones by CliftonM. #KSP

[/QUOTE]
Wow...I didn't expect that... GregroxMun and I are planning to put together, as stated, a wider variety of skin tones. I can't believe that a mod I whipped up in a couple hours has been so widely loved. Thank you!

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[quote name='acc']to be honest as I've read the topic title I was expecting real human models :([/QUOTE]
I am hoping to be able to do that at one point. :)

[quote name='CliftonM']Wow...I didn't expect that... GregroxMun and I are planning to put together, as stated, a wider variety of skin tones. I can't believe that a mod I whipped up in a couple hours has been so widely loved. Thank you!

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]


I am hoping to be able to do that at one point. :)[/QUOTE]

The first version that has more skin tones is this one, the one I released after seeing CliftonM's and the one which we are now sort-of-collaborating on.
[URL="https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/1285/Human%20Colored%20Faces"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Pb5Zc6r.png[/IMG][/URL]
That's not even all of them.

Textures added:

[B]Default[/B]
[list]
[*]White Male Head (default kerbalHead)

[*]White Female Head (default kerbalGirl_06_BaseColor)

[*]White Male Head with blond hair (Gene Kerman)

[*]Old Black Male Head (Mortimer Kerman)

[*]White Male Head with Moustache (Wernher von Kerman)

[*]White Male White-Blonde Hair with Goatee (Walt Kerman and WhiteGuyBlond)
[/list]
[B]Heads[/B]
[list]
[*]AsianGirl (medium yellowish skin tone)

[*]AsianGuy (medium yellowish skin tone)

[*]BlackGirl1 (dark skin tone)

[*]BlackGirl2 (darker skin tone)

[*]BlackGirl3 (darker darker skin tone and greyish fuzzy hair)

[*]BlackGuy1 (dark skin tone, military hair cut)

[*]BlackGuy2 (dark skin tone, goatee)

[*]BlackGuy3 (slightly less dark skin tone, moustache)

[*]HispanicGirl (light brown-tan-beige sort of skin color)

[*]HispanicGuy (light brown-tan-beige sort of skin color)

[*]WhiteGirlBlackhair (White skin with apparently wavy hair)

[*]WhiteGirlBlonde (White skin with straight white-blonde hair)

[*]WhiteGirlBrunette1 (White skin with wavy brown hair)

[*]WhiteGirlBrunette2 (White skin with straight brown hair)

[*]WhiteGirlDarkRed (White skin with wavy red-orange hair)

[*]WhiteGirlGinger (Pale white skin with straight red-orange hair)

[*]WhiteGuy1 (White skin with black military hair cut)

[*]WhiteGuy2 (White skin with black military hair cut and a moustache)

[*]WhiteGuy3 (White skin with parted black hair)

[*]WhiteGuyBlond (White skin with parted blonde hair and a goatee)
[/list]

And perhaps most importantly: The female skins use the female Kerbal texture base instead of the Male kerbal texture base.

Could not have done this without CliftonM's mod for inspiration! :) Edited November 24, 2015 by GregroxMun
Hmm looks cool! I will take a look when I get home:cool:

Kerbals -> Humans?
Kerbals -> Plants?
Humans -> Plants?

Interesting Conclusions....
